data.eml:eml: Paroxythrips gen. n. (Thysanoptera, Thripidae), associated with the gymnosperm order Araucariales in Japan and Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Masumoto, Masami, Okajima, Shûji (2017): Paroxythrips gen. n. (Thysanoptera, Thripidae), associated with the gymnosperm order Araucariales in Japan and Australia. Zootaxa 4236 (2): 343-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4236.2.9
